original_text: Jesus did not let him, but said, “Go home to your own people and tell them how much the Lord has done for you, and how he has had mercy on you.”
korean_text: 허락하지 아니하시고 그에게 이르시되 집으로 돌아가 주께서 네게 어떻게 큰 일을 행하사 너를 불쌍히 여기신 것을 네 가족에게 알리라 하시니

sentences.original_text: Go home to your own people
and tell them how much the Lord has done for you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주께서 너를 위해 얼마나 많은 일을 하셨는지 말하라

sentences.original_text: and how he has had mercy on you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 너에게 자비를 베풀었는지 말하라
